summary: While waiting for directions, two revolutionaries hide in a church, where they meet a woman who wants to have a son with one of them.
cast: Renato Borghi|Carlos Gregório|Renato Dobal|Paulo Augusto|Cao|Zenaider Rios|Elizabeth Kauder|Antônio Brasil|Carlos Prieto|Elke Hering|Otávio Augusto|Ítala Nandi
keywords: female nudity|experimental film|avant garde|revolutionary|male rear nudity
title: Prata Palomares
